candidate Profile Description.name: Fayaz Moqueem Mohammed
candidate Profile Description.summary: A dedicated and innovative AI enthusiast with a passion for harnessing the power of technology to solve real-world problems.

education.degree: MAS.664 AI for Impact: Venture Studio

experience.title: Teaching Assistant
responsibilities: Guided students through Python-based ML model training.
Assisted in project development and delivered engaging lab lectures.

experience.title: Research Assistant
responsibilities: Led the training of GPT-3, BERT, and DALL-E models for ethical AI content creation.
Managed comprehensive datasets and contributed to the creation of a novel framework.

experience.title: Data Analyst
responsibilities: Designed and deployed a Power BI sales analytics dashboard.

projects.title: Fusion of Tech and Finance: Crypto Forecaster
projects.description: Developed a BERT-based trading signal system for dynamic market predictions.

projects.title: CineSentient: Movie Recommendation System
projects.description: Engineered a concise NLP-based movie recommendation engine using BERT, GPT-2, and RoBERTa.

projects.title: Image-to-Image Translation with GANs
projects.description: Led research on advanced GAN architectures for efficient real-time image-to-image translation.

projects.title: Deepfake Detection Using Capsule Networks
projects.description: Developed a Capsule Network and ResNet-based detection system.

projects.title: WELFAKE Fake News Detection
projects.description: Developed a fake news detection system using BERT and LFS for NLP-based feature extraction.

achievements.title: Meta AI Video Similarity Challenge 2023
achievements.description: Ranked 5th in identifying video similarities by fine-tuning the DINO model.

achievements.title: Small-Object Detection Challenge for Spotting Birds
achievements.description: Achieved Top 2% at MVA2023 by developing and optimizing RetinaNet and Cascade R-CNN models.

publications.title: Online Shopping Fake Reviews Detection Using Machine Learning
publications.authors: Afraz Mohammed, Fayaz Moqueem, Chandra Vamshi Reddy, Dannana Jayanth & Brinta Brahma
publications.conference: Springer International Conference of Cognition and Recognition 2021 (ICCR-21)

publications.title: Multi-Class Safety Helmet Detection using Faster - RCNN and Single Shot Detector Algorithms
publications.authors: Afraz Mohammed, Fayaz Moqueem, & Vishnu Vardhan
publications.conference: Proceedings of International Conference on Emerging Trends in Digital Technologies (ICETDT 2022)

responsibilities: Developed object detection models (Faster R-CNN, SSD) achieving 94.32% accuracy in industrial safety helmet detection.
Applied NLP for fake review detection on digital platforms, enhancing e-commerce credibility.
